name: HSC_RECRD_STAT_HX
description: This table stores information related to the record status of specimens.

columns.name: RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the Specimen record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the record statuses that are associated with the specimens from the HSC master file.

columns.name: SDFL_EDIT_INSTANT
columns.description: The instant the Specimen record status was changed.

columns.name: SDFL_EDIT_USER_ID
columns.description: The unique User ID of the user who changed the specimen record status.

columns.name: SDFL_EDIT_USER_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.

columns.name: SDFL_EDIT_ACTION_C_NAME
columns.description: The category number for the action taken in a change of the Specimen record status.
